CORBPatterns Struct Reference

#include <VLIB_orb.h>

Detailed Description

Structure containing automatically computed pattern information needed by VLIB_ORB_computeRBrief.

Field Documentation

int32_t CORBPatterns::octave

The user can set this parameter, to keep track of which pyramid level these patterns are for
